alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 02 at 5:44AM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 to 70 mph. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The combination of snow and wind will create hazardous backcountry travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to fall in the higher terrain along the Yellowstone National Park border. There will be a relative lull in the snowfall late tonight and Sunday morning. For forecast snowfall images, go to weather.gov/riverton/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
